        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f37c4694387457155aec99bfe383466ad55d4810</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f37c4694387457155aec99bfe383466ad55d4810</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Utilising the energy of a boiling water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden der Energie eines kochenden Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de l'énergie d'une eau bouillante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Utilizando a energia de uma água fervendo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Utilizzazione dell'energia di un'acqua di 
ebollizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση της ενέργειας ενός βράζοντας ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utilizar la energía de un agua hirvienda</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the energy in a kettle of boiling water is no longer transferable to a more useful form.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Energie in einem 
Kessel des kochenden Wassers nicht mehr zu einem nützlicheren 
Formular übertragbar ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'énergie dans une
bouilloire d'eau bouillante n'est plus transmissible à une forme plus
utile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia em uma 
chaleira da água fervendo é uma transferable não mais longo a um 
formulário mais útil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia in una 
caldaia dell'acqua di ebollizione non è più trasferibile ad una 
forma più utile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενέργεια σε μια 
κατσαρόλα του βράζοντας ύδατος δεν είναι πλέον μεταβιβάσιμη σε 
μια πιό χρήσιμη μορφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía en una 
caldera del agua hirvienda es una tranferible no más largo a una 
forma más útil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia térmica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía termal</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
